attributes.action: Commit funding to ensure the future of the British Grand Prix.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Formula One is dominated by British teams, the current World champion is British (2008). The F1 championship itself started in Britain. Donnington acquired the contract for F1 from SIlverstone, and there have been doubts over its future due to rent problems, it's about time the Government stepped in to safeguard a sport which is loved by millions in the UK, just 0.002% of the Olympic fund would do this!
